sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import "./ContactUs.css" import axios from 'axios' import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' import { useState } from "react" const ContactUs = () => { function sendEmail(event) { event.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_77zg6j5', 'template_8ar6i1u', event.target, 'Bc6zp71L3vdtqZ1wO') .then(res => { console.log(res); }).catch(err => console.log(err)); } const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: "", phone: "", email: "", city: "", course: "", webinar: "", event: "", business: "", college: "", paidInternship: "", message: "" }) let name, value; const handleInputs = (e) => { console.log(e); name = e.target.name; value = e.target.value; setUser({ ...user, [name]: value }) } const current = new Date(); const date = `${current.getDate()}-${current.getMonth() + 1}-${current.getFullYear()}`; const submitData = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const { name, phone, email, city, course, webinar, event, business, college, paidInternship, message } = user; if (name && phone && email && college && message) { const res = fetch(`https://teslaev-c75c3-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/userDataRecord/${date}/${name}.json`, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify({ name, phone, email, city, course, webinar, event, business, college, paidInternship, message }), } ); if (res) { setUser({ name: "", phone: "", email: "", city: "", course: "", webinar: "", event: "", business: "", college: "", paidInternship: "", message: "" }); alert("Data Stored"); } else { alert("plz fill the data"); } } else { alert("plz fill the data"); } }; return ( <>

Connect With Us!

Send us your message by filling out the form below. One of our advisors will be happy to get in touch with you!!!!
Contact Us

*Your privacy is our concern. We are just taking the details to match your requirements with us.

{/*
*/}

Head Office

Flat 11B, Darshan Park Building B, Behind Hotel Kunal, Kalewadi, Pimpri, Pune - 411017

Electric Vehicles Training Center

PCCOE, Akurdi, Pune

All Types of Vehicles and Service Center:

Mirajkar Automobiles, Dange Chowk, Pune

(Electric Vehicle Scooters, Electric Rickshaw & Electric Loader are Repaired and Serviced Here)
{/*
*/}
{/*
*/}
{/*
*/}
{/*
*/}

Contact

Phone No.: +91 9764001799 (Whatsapp)
Monday to Sunday: 9.30 a.m. to 6.00 p.m.
Email-id: director @teslaevacademy.com
{/*
*/}
) } export default ContactUs
